name: Planetary Pest Control
description:
Planetary Pest Control is an asymmetrical couch co-op shooter, featuring a monkey with a mohawk, a very friendly robot and too many bugs to count.

After being hired to exterminate the insects on a foreign planet, Wrench and E.V crashland way off the intended location, forcing them to finish the job on foot and find a different way off world. As they work through this sinister forest, they defend themselves from the native life and ponder what makes this planet interesting enough to be bought by a secretive billionaire.
